tool_description: The QR Code Generator API allows you to generate QR codes for provided URLs. It is a simple and efficient way to convert URLs into scannable QR codes. This API accepts a URL as a query parameter and returns a QR code image in PNG format as the response. The generated QR code can be downloaded and used in various applications and platforms. This API provides an easy-to-use endpoint for integrating QR code generation capabilities into your own applications or services. It is built using Python...
name: QR Code Generator API
title: QR Code Generator API

api_list.name: QR Code Image_copy
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a 'GET' request with URL/string as a parameter and returns a QR code image.
